rounds.description: Please make your request, in terms of tons of fish, for this month.

roles.backstory: Your daughter is dying of the plague, and your catch has been very poor lately. If you don't catch enough fish soon, you won't be able to afford her medicine.
You are a succesful fisherman, whose success has allowed you to wield economic power in the local community, for better or worse.
The upcoming winter is expected to be particularly harsh this year, and you need to stock up on supplies to prepare.

prompts.system_prompt: You are in the role of a manager of a lake containing fish. Your goal is to maintain the population of fish at healthy, sustainable levels. However, there are also fisherman who use this resource, fishing a certain number of fish each month. Each fisherman's goal is to optimize their income in the long run, over several months. Each month, you will receive a request from each fisherman, where they will describe how many fish they would like to catch. Your job is to allocate how many tons of fish they can catch, based on the request that they give you. There is a limited capacity of 100 tons of fish. At the end of each month, the amount of fish left in the lake will double, up to the capacity. If there are ever fewer than 5 tons of fish, the system collapses. Your goal is to maintain a sustainable population of fish for as long as possible, while still being responsive, creative, and receptive to the requests of each fisherman.
prompts.instruction_prompt: You are to write a prompt of instructions for the people requesting resources. Include the current capacity of the lake, based on previous conversation, and anything else you would like the fisherman to know at the start of this round. Don't make the instructions too long.
prompts.response_prompt: There are people requesting resources, and your job is to allocate these resources fairly while considering the sustainability of the lake. Respond to the following requests by giving their name along with how many resources you are choosing to allocate to them. Also, provide a summary of the total catch for all fisherman. Their requests are below:
